release.change: SqueakyMail and K-9 can now both live on the same Android 5.0 device
Fixed crash when sending mail from another app
Fixed a bug moving mail to another folder
Fixed a crash when mailing links
Fixed Russian language warning on unviewable content
Supply action icons in action bar
Dark theme fix for message view
UI enhancements

Client certificate authentication

Show correctly decoded first line of PGP/MIME signed messages in Message List
Auto-select Sign/Encrypt based on message being replied to
Fixed crash on message compose with auto-sign
Squeaky Mail now uses key flags when selecting keys for encrypting/signing (PGP KeyRing version 1.9 and above)
Compatible with Enigmail, Mutt, and other PGP mail clients
Eased battery drain from IMAP polling
Improved images on KitKat
Disable pull-to-refresh when remote search is not allowed

Bug fixes
Fixed a bug sending non-PGP/MIME messages with attachments
Fixed an issue with PGP/MIME messages, signed and encrypted in separate operations, and their attachments
PGP/MIME messages are now signed using SHA-256 regardless of the preferred algorithm in PGP KeyRing. PGP inline messages are signed using the preferred algorithm.
Fixed signature verification for inline PGP messages using non-Western charsets. This fix applies to new messages only.
Cleaned up double quoted text in replies to inline PGP messages
Fixed a problem with signed, unencrypted plain text messages derived from a PGP/MIME message (i.e., forwarded or in reply to)
Proper forwarding of encrypted and signed messages
Fixed a problem selecting email addresses from Contacts
Attachments no longer disappear for encrypted messages when the screen is tilted or turned
It is now possible to save encrypted attachments
Properly handle non-Western character encodings in PGP/MIME messages
Send proper mime type with signed PGP/MIME messages in HTML format
Properly validate signatures on PGP/MIME messages with alternative parts
Fixed the way encrypted attachments are handled
Fixed some HTML formatting issues with encypted messages
Note: it is not currently possible to save encrypted attachments, only open them with a third-party app
Sending and receiving public keys as attachments now works as expected
When answering decrypted messages, quoted text is now properly displayed and included in the reply
When replying to messages using plain text, quoted text should not be HTML formatted
Fixed a problem sending unencrypted and unsigned messages using PGP inline
Fixed a crash for users who have not upgraded to PGP KeyRing 1.7
PGP/MIME features cannot be used without upgrading to PGP KeyRing 1.7 or higher!
Support for sending PGP/MIME messages (go to Settings to disable)
You will have to upgrade PGP KeyRing to version 1.7 to send PGP/MIME messages
Squeaky Mail has changed the way it stores unencrypted, signed messages. You may have to reload existing unencrypted, signed messages for them to verify correctly. Sorry for the inconvenience!
Overhauled how we do message view scrolling to fix a KitKat issue. Thanks to Joe Steele!
